projects.title: Yeet
projects.description: During the pandemic, I got annoyed of having to click through my bookmarks bar everyday to open all the websites I needed for school. So, I created Yeet, a quick-launcher Chrome extension that allows users to open all the tabs they need for work in one click.

projects.title: BananaList
projects.description: BananaList is an a-peel-ing desktop to-do list application. It provides users with urgency labels and an integrated point-reward system to keep that motivation high üí™

projects.title: WeatherWidget
projects.description: A simple weather widget that displays current temperature and feel in Vancouver. Comes with cool animations!
